Boosting.definition: is a powerful meta-algorithm used in supervised machine learning to improve prediction accuracy of classification models by combining a set of weak classifiers into a strong and robust model, which is able to reduce the prediction bias
Boosting.label: machine_learning

Gradient boosting.definition: is an extension of boosting, in which the process of additive generation of weak models is based on a gradient descent algorithm over an objective function
Gradient boosting.label: machine_learning

Gradient boosting decision tree.definition: is an ensemble model of decision trees, used as weak learners in the gradient boosting ensemble classification model
Gradient boosting decision tree.label: machine_learning
